content.value: To mark Valentine's Day, BTO members organized a blanket distribution! We embarked on a 5 kilometre journey around downtown Toronto and distributed thermal blankets to the homeless. The weather was cold, but we remained warm and friendly! Money earned through membership fees and donations to BTO will go towards purchasing blankets for future blanket distributions like this one!

childMarkdownRemark.html: Read about how BTO members distributed blankets in downtown Toronto on a chilly Valentine's Day.

node.title: Water.org UTSC x BTO Winter/Holiday Event

childMarkdownRemark.html: We collaborate with Water.org UTSC to provide students with opportunities to socialize with friends, win prizes in games and raffles, and become better informed about homelessness in Toronto and water scarcity around the world.
In November 2020, still amid the COVID-19 Pandemic, BTO engaged in a donut distribution initiative while also helping to promote a local small business.
In October, BTO hosted a pumpkin carving contest for UTSC students and giveaway.
